concept.definition: An organization such as a public health agency, community/social services provider, etc.
An organization providing research-related services such as conducting research, recruiting research participants, analyzing data, etc.
An organization providing reimbursement, payment, or related services
An organization providing diagnostic testing/laboratory services
An organization that provides medical supplies (e.g. medical devices, equipment, pharmaceutical products, etc.)
An organization that facilitates electronic clinical data exchange between entities
A type of non-ownership relationship between entities (encompasses partnerships, collaboration, joint ventures, etc.)

description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the role of one Organization in relation to its affiliation with another.
name: OrganizationAffiliationRole

text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/organization-role defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
provider Provider
agency AgencyAn organization such as a public health agency, community/social services provider, etc.
research ResearchAn organization providing research-related services such as conducting research, recruiting research participants, analyzing data, etc.
payer PayerAn organization providing reimbursement, payment, or related services
diagnostics DiagnosticsAn organization providing diagnostic testing/laboratory services
supplier SupplierAn organization that provides medical supplies (e.g. medical devices, equipment, pharmaceutical products, etc.)
HIE/HIO HIE/HIOAn organization that facilitates electronic clinical data exchange between entities
member MemberA type of non-ownership relationship between entities (encompasses partnerships, collaboration, joint ventures, etc.)
